Description:
What a place to call Home!
Set at the end of a beautiful court in White Hills on a generous allotment of 625 sqm approx. This fantastic home offers the perfect beginning for first home buyers or investors in a quiet safe family friendly location.
Comprising of the following features:
- Light & bright spaces, it is a solid / well positioned home with a lovely feel.
- Four bedrooms with ample storage, the fourth could be a sunroom / study or optional 4th bedroom.
- Large family living zone & lounge.
- Well-appointed kitchen with bulk storage & gas cooking.
- Evaporative cooling & gas heating offer year round comfort.
- Large alfresco entertaining area
- Large garage (8 m X 6 m) & handy workshop (3 m X 4 m) all of this in a secure enclosed yard.
- Currently tenanted for $290.00 per week until July 2020, a secure investment.
This affordable home is located in the ever so popular White Hills. Close to the walking track which takes you into the Bendigo CBD, passing a Primary School, High School and only a stones throw from public transport and all the amenities White Hills has to offer. Get in quick!
Insights: 23 Morshead Court, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
A GREAT INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY!
This well positioned family home is sure to impress any first home buyer or investor seeking a long time tenant. Showing a Gross Return on Investment of equivalent to about 6.5% under the National Affordability Rental Scheme, this is an opportunity not to be missed. The current tenant has resided since built (2012) and would love to stay on. The home features 4 good size bedrooms with robes, family bathroom and separate toilet. The main bedroom has en-suite and walk in robe. There's an open plan family/dining with sliding door out to the alfresco area, and a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances plus a 2 door pantry. Includes gas ducted heating plus a heating & cooling split system in the comfortable lounge area. A double garage with remote has internal access into the home. Side access is also a possibility for extra vehicles.
Internal area
200m²

Address: 125 St Killian Street White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
Creativity, Builder's Skill and Imagination wanted
Less than 1km away to the new Botanical Gardens in White Hills, and minutes to the picturesque walking tracks set along the creek that lead you into Lake Weeroona or Epsom, is this incomplete building project.
This 4 bedroom homestead has had extensive work done to it, but is in need of being fully completed to be enjoyed and admired.
Main bedroom with ensuite facilities available and walk-in robe.
Huge open plan kitchen, meals, family room with open fire place.
Incomplete new 3 piece bathroom and laundry.
Kitchen has all the features and benefits to be loved on completion also.
Re-roofed, plus front and back verandahs, on (approx) 700m2 allotment with 6m x 9.5m shed.
This home has all the hallmarks to be a standout in the street.

*Fabulous 586m2 block available at Botanica Green
*Offering an impressive list of lifestyle rich features

*Only minutes to the Bendigo CBD and all amenities

This block of land represents a fabulous opportunity for first home buyers to secure a great block of land and to take advantage of the first home owner grants of $20,000 on new homes and the savings on stamp duty.

Description:
The Price is Right!
This 1970s style solid brick home is waiting its next chapter. With timber floors and larger rooms this house would renovate well to become a great investment or family home. With work to be done, this property would be one of the best priced homes available on the market today.
With your investment of time and skill, you will surely create a very comfortable home. The block allows for easy access to the back yard and workshop through side double gates.
Inside Features:
Large main bedroom with BIR and ceiling fan
All bedrooms have built in robes
Good sized lounge room with gas heating
Separate dining room
Timber floors throughout
Large linen cupboard
Ducted evaporative cooling
Outside features:
Large block with side access to back yard.
Workshop approx. 5.3 m x 5.3 m with concrete floor
Private backyard

Address: Ca 16/580 Napier Street White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
WOW WHAT A BLOCK 2400 sqm allotment!
Yes, an allotment with 2 street frontage, this has many possibilities. Either build your dream home and only approx. 5 kms from the CBD, this large piece of land would be ideal for the family home, incorporate the double garage into your plans and have space around you, or subdivide into either 2 large lots or into a mini subdivision all STCA. These parcels of land are rare, take the opportunity while it is here, situated close to the beautiful White Hills Botanic Gardens & Holy Rosary school, with easy access to the new 4 lane roads into the city, positioned in a great spot!!.

Description:
VICTORIAN CHARMER SO CLOSE TO TOWN, EVEN CLOSER TO LAKE WEEROONA'S PARKS AND PATHWAYS!
Set on an 457m2 block and so close to local sports ground, schools and shops, this very charming 1880s home is in beautiful condition with modern day style, renovations and finishes.
The home comprises a central hallway from the traditional verandah entry, 3 bedrooms with robes. There is modern well-appointed kitchen, ample storage, dishwasher, separate laundry and a spacious lounge-dining that opens to a Alfresco deck, plus a separate lounge room with a redbrick fireplace. The home has reverse cycle heating and cooling, polished timber floors and retains much of its original period charm blended to the modern lifestyle.
Enjoy a home that is within easy reach of all you need.
Internal area
132m²

Description:
Quality home in a peaceful court.
2 LORNA COURT, WHITE HILLS
Only minutes to local schools, shopping centres and the Botanical gardens, located in arguably one of the most sort after courts in White Hills, Is this fantastic quality home.
Perfectly suited for a young family as a first home or the ultimate downsizer.
Boasting three generous sized bedrooms, the master has its own en-suite and walk in robe. The remaining rooms have built in robes. Two distinct living areas at the front and rear of the home. Main bathroom consists of a bath, shower and vanity with a separate toilet close by.
The well-appointed kitchen consists of stone bench-tops, upright 900mm stainless oven with gas cook top and electric oven, loads of storage including a fantastic walk-in pantry and large cavity for the fridge. The kitchen leads into the magnificent entertaining area with an undercover area of 6.9m x 5.5m. Perfect for the warmer months ahead, as well as privacy it has a TV point, ceiling fan and exposed aggregate concrete.
Other features of the home are a setback double garage with a remote roller door. (Plenty of parking space at the front for a caravan) The garage conveniently has entry to the home as well as a rear roller door for drive through access to the yard.
Central gas ducted heating as well as evaporative cooling.
Inspections will not disappoint call Justin or Marc for your personal viewing today.

Description:
SUBURBAN RETREAT
You almost would not believe you were five minutes from Bendigo's CBD when you're looking out the to private back yard retreat from the covered alfresco space of this immaculately presented four-bedroom home in popular Peppercorn Estate.
The home looks and feels new inside, and it has a beautiful flow from the entry, past the carpeted lounge, down the wide hall to the light and bright open plan kitchen-meals-family. The floors are a quality Bamboo, there are big windows, the family room is huge and there is enough room for an eight-seat table and there is a big timber sliding door which opens to the spacious, open al-fresco space which boasts Merbau deck, gable roof and views to the immaculate back yard.
The kitchen features stone tops, a large island bench with double sink and dishwasher, walk in pantry which has been cleverly designed to access the double auto garage (great for the groceries); and all modern conveniences.
Robes feature in all three bedrooms and the large master suite boasts a walk-in-robe and en-suite with big shower, vanity unit and toilet.
There is good storage throughout, high ceilings, quality blinds and carpet, zoned ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling.
Outside there is a double auto garage and a separate secondary driveway for a caravan, work vehicle or trailer; in the yard you will find a 4m x 7m powered workshop with single roller-door and addition sundry storage shed. The yard is second-to-none with lovely green Santa Ana couch grass (it will remind you of a golf green), a mix of established fruit trees on the boundary in front of the Colorbond fences amongst other foliage. You don't feel like there are neighbours at all - it is very clever. There is separate grey water for all gardens, most of which is automated with pop-up sprinklers and drippers.
This is simply a well-though out home in a superb position close to Bendigo Creek walking track and plenty of open space fir kids; only five minutes to Bendigo's CBD and all other amenities.

Description:
Immaculately Presented & Full of Character
Offering amazing street appeal with its distinctive design, this spacious residence is set in a peaceful location, and nestled amongst beautifully maintained gardens. The opportunity is finally here to take over this amazing property, which has been tightly held by the current owners for over 50 years.
Comprises 3 bedrooms with built in robes, 2 bathrooms, tastefully updated kitchen/meals area, formal lounge, plus a substantial rumpus/living area upstairs which includes a balcony/outdoor sitting area.
Bathroom facilities are located on both levels for convenience, and there are multiple heating and cooling options to ensure year round comfort.
Those who enjoy being outside will love the large undercover entertaining area, perfect for relaxing/entertaining and overlooking established plants and lawn areas. The yard also includes a shed/workshop and is secure for children and pets.
For additional security and insulation, there are numerous electric roller shutters installed around the home.
Convenient position within close proximity to local schools, medical facilities, stunning botanical gardens, dining and recreation. Epsom Shopping Centre, and the Bendigo CBD are also easily accessible. Presented beautifully inside and out, this is a home that will appeal to a variety of buyers in the market today.

Description:
Future development opportunity awaits.
What a captivating combination a neat, two bedroom home on a large block, conveniently located, zoned GRZ, offering desirable development scope.
Enjoying a 20m frontage and a deep rear yard, this prized find enjoys tiled floors throughout the living areas, two carpeted bedrooms (BIR), central bathroom, gas-heated lounge, light-filled kitchen/meals area, laundry and separate toilet.
The big rear garden is home to a double carport with roller door and side retractable blinds for use as an outdoor living area, garden shed and two rainwater tanks.
There's plenty of scope to make the home your own by extending or further develop the approx 976m² lot. The existing home positioned at the front with dual side access provides the perfect scenario for future additions (STCA) or a rewarding investment for the future.
Handy location close to Weeroona College, child care centre, Lake Weeroona, public transport and a five-minute drive to the city centre.

Description:
Easy maintenance, like new home in a quiet court and convenient location.
Phone enquiries - please quote property ID 21407
Neat 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with a spacious 2 car garage on 320 m2.
Carrington Close is a quiet court, only a 7 minute drive from the centre of town and 5 minutes from the hospital. The court has creek access and it's 2km to Lake Weeroona one way and 1km to the beautiful botanical gardens the other - all along the waterfront!
It's walking distance from the White Hills shops, and kids can walk along the creek to both White Hills Primary and Weeroona College without crossing a single road.
The house itself is 3 years old and like new. The master is roomy and has a generously sized walk-in-robe and en-suite.
The kitchen has ample bench space and room to move, with a walk in pantry and built in wall oven and gas stovetop.
The garage fits 2 cars comfortably with space for storage on both sides. The yard is low maintenance with a built in clothes line on the laundry side and a covered alfresco area.
We have loved living here and it is a perfect place for a small family, young couple, retirees, or people looking for an investment property.

Description:
RIPE FOR DEVELOPMENT
Absolutely ideal to develop further right now STCA or retain and enjoy a large land parcel in the heart of White Hills with scope to develop later STCA. Located only five minutes to Bendigo's city centre.
2,700 square metres of General Residential land with three street frontage including over 79m frontage to New Street which is a newly developed area and has been recently kerbed and channelled.
The parcel is quite flat, clear and all serviced are close by. Position is excellent being close to transport, walking tracks (including Bendigo Creek), Botanical Gardens, schools and shops.
A sought-after location, really worth considering!

Perfect block for first home buyers or retirees
*Botanica Green is a new boutique residential estate
*Offering an impressive list of lifestyle rich features
*Set opposite the beautiful Botanical Gardens
*Only 4.6 km from the Bendigo CBD
*Positioned in one of Bendigo's most highly regarded locations
*Close to schools, shops, health & sporting facilities
*Walking and cycling trails nearby
*Lovely block of 448m2 with all services
This block of land represents a fabulous opportunity for first home buyers to secure a great block of land and to take advantage of the first home owner grants of $20,000 on new homes and the savings on stamp duty where contracts are signed after 1st July, 2017. Why not give us a call to ascertain how you could secure the block today and still receive the grants.

Description:
Compact and Complete
Blending character with clean, crisp lines of contemporary styling, this 3 bedroom home has been refreshed and is ready to revel in. Compact and complete, it offers a fuss-free lifestyle in close proximity to all kinds of local conveniences and attractions.
Recently repainted and featuring ducted heating and cooling, it's as warm in the winter as it is cool in the summertime. A resplendent kitchen with stainless steel oven and ceramic cooktop sit amongst loads of bench space, ample cupboards and pot-drawers. Beautiful bathroom fittings include a clawfoot slipper tub creating a surprisingly complementary contrast combined with modern vanity and tiling.
The living room is a great size at 6.2 metres long and has wide corner windows to welcome morning sunshine inside. Take advantage of the quiet street by adding green screens to the broad side patio at the entrance for a lovely outdoor living area.
Fully fenced in Colourbond panels, the property also has a small rear yard to secure pets and little people, plus off-street parking for one vehicle. But you can leave that car at home, as so much is within walking distance. Stroll to schools, college, medical practice, pharmacy, post office, hairdresser, pool, botanic gardens, pub, footy, clothing alterations, racecourse, golf, cafe, takeaway, butcher and baker. No candlestick maker, but there is a kindergarten 260 metres up the road and buses around the corner. It's only a 7 minute drive or 12 minute bike ride into the heart of the city to make life at this fabulous address even easier.
This home could potentially achieve a rental return of between $310 and $320 per week.
Internal area
110m²
